content.rendered: I happened upon this pair picking blackberries along the Parkland Walk a month ago or so. I cycle along this old railway/nature reserve a lot during the summer, to visit my mum in Muswell Hill. At a certain point in late August you can practically taste the berries on the air, the scent of them is so strong.
